data.name: Phone
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to enter their telephone number

data.name: Requested date
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to select a date

data.name: Requested date and time
data.comment: Label to show a customer what date and time they selected

data.name: Requested time
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to select a time

data.name: Subject
data.comment: Label next to a drop-down with a list of subjects

data.name: Back
data.comment: Navigation button: go back to a previous page

data.name: Back to the site
data.comment: Navigation button: go back to the Web site

data.name: Go
data.comment: Navigation button: perform a search or other action

data.name: Next
data.comment: Navigation button: go forward to the next page in a process

data.name: Submit
data.comment: Button: submit form data

data.name: Subscribe
data.comment: Button: subscribe to a mailing list

data.name: Use my location
data.comment: Button: engage a mobile device's GPS to look up the customer's location

data.name: Connect with us on social media!
data.value: ¡Conéctese con nosotros en las redes sociales!
data.comment: Call to action: visit social media accounts

data.name: Connect with us on {0}
data.comment: Call to action: visit a specific social media account; {0} is replaced with the platform (e.g. "Twitter" or "Instagram")

data.name: There was a problem locating these coordinates: {0}, {1}
data.value: Hubo un problema al localizar estas coordenadas: {0}, {1}
data.comment: Error message: that the customer's geographic location couldn't be located; {0} and {1} are the GPS coordinates

data.name: Error
data.comment: Message indicating a general, unspecified error

data.name: This service is only available on the following days: {0}
data.value: Este servicio solo está disponible los siguientes días: {0}
data.comment: Error message: showing which days a service is available; {0} are the days the service is available

data.name: That date is not available for scheduling: {0}
data.value: Esa fecha no está disponible para programación: {0}
data.comment: Error message: a day is not available for a service; {0} is the date the customer selected

data.name: You must request a date on or after: {0}
data.value: Debe solicitar una fecha a partir del: {0}
data.comment: Error message: the earliest day a service can be engaged; {0} is the earliest date

data.name: The earliest time you can select is: {0}
data.value: La primera hora que puede seleccionar es: {0}
data.comment: Error message: the earliest time a service can be engaged; {0} is the earliest time

data.name: The furthest date you can schedule a call is: {0}
data.value: La fecha más lejana en la que puede programar una llamada es: {0}
data.comment: Error message: the latest date that a telephone call can be scheduled; {0} is the furthest date a call can be scheduled

data.name: There was a problem finding this ZIP code: {0}
data.value: Hubo un problema para encontrar este código postal: {0}
data.comment: Error message: that a ZIP code could not be found; {0} is the ZIP code the customer entered

data.name: No available times for scheduling could be found.
data.value: No se pudieron encontrar horarios disponibles para la programación.
data.comment: Error message: there are no times available to schedule

data.name: Page not found
data.comment: Web error when a page is not found (a 404 error)

data.name: An error occurred while processing your request.
data.value: Se produjo un error al procesar su solicitud.
data.comment: Message indicating a general, unspecified error

data.name: Unfortunately your session has timed out. Please reselect your time and subject.
data.value: Lamentablemente, se agotó el tiempo de espera de su sesión. Vuelva a seleccionar su hora y tema.
data.comment: Too long has elapsed while the user was viewing a form and their session expired.

data.name: Please enter a telephone number in the format: ###-###-####
data.value: Ingrese un número de teléfono en el formato: ### - ### - ####
data.comment: Error message: telephone number was not entered in the proper format

data.name: You must request a time before: {0}
data.comment: Error message: the latest time a service can be requested; {0} is the latest time

data.name: Please enter a 5 digit numeric ZIP code.
data.value: Ingrese un código postal numérico de 5 dígitos.
data.comment: Error message: the ZIP code format was not correct

data.name: {0} help
data.comment: Title for help on a specific resource; {0} is the name of the resource (e.g. "ConsumerReports.org" or "OverDrive")

data.name: Keywords: {0}
data.comment: Display a list of keywords; {0} is replaced with a comma-separated list of keywords

data.name: Back to {0}
data.comment: Button: return to the page detailing a location; {0} is the name of the location

data.name: Details
data.comment: Button: view details

data.name: Events
data.comment: Button: view events

data.name: Call us at {0}
data.comment: Call to action: message to call us; {0} is replaced with the telephone number

data.name: Closed
data.comment: Location status message, the location is closed

data.name: Closed today
data.comment: Location status message, the location is closed for today

data.name: Our current operating hours are:
data.value: Nuestras horas de funcionamiento actuales son:
data.comment: Label prefixing the current operating hours of a location

data.name: {0} at {1} Library
data.comment: Location feature heading; {0} is the feature of the location, {1} is the name of the location

data.name: Find my Library
data.comment: Title of the page to locate the nearest library

data.name: Library Information
data.comment: Page header for information section of location page

data.name: Interested in updates from every library in this area?
data.value: ¿Está interesado en las actualizaciones de todas las bibliotecas de esta área?
data.comment: Prompt before button to subscribe to multiple mailing lists

data.name: Nearby Locations
data.comment: Page header for other locations which are narby

data.name: Open
data.comment: Location status message, the location is open

data.name: Opens at {0}
data.comment: Location status message, the location opens at a time; {0} is replaced with the time

data.name: Opens {0} at {1}
data.comment: Location status message, the location opens at a date and time; {0} is the day of the week, {1} is the time

data.name: Open until {0}
data.comment: Location status message, open until a time; {0} is the time that the location closes

data.name: Our address:
data.comment: Label indicating the location address follows

data.name: There was a problem determining your location.
data.value: Hubo un problema al determinar su ubicación.
data.comment: Error message: location could not be determined for finding the nearest location via GPS

data.name: See a map to this location
data.value: Ver un mapa de esta ubicación
data.comment: Label indicating a link takes the customer to a map of the location

data.name: Locations
data.comment: Page header for showing locations

data.name: Subscribe to updates from all of these libraries.
data.value: Suscríbase a las actualizaciones de todas estas bibliotecas.
data.comment: Link to subscribe to mailing lists for all libraries which are listed

data.name: Subscribe to updates from: {0}
data.comment: Link to subscribe to a mailing list for a location; {0} is the name of the location

data.name: tomorrow
data.comment: Location status message, word to indicate the next open date is tomorrow

data.name: Updates from all {0} locations
data.comment: Button to subscribe to updates from all listed locations; {0} is the number of locations

data.name: Updates from {0} locations
data.comment: Button to subscribe to updates from a number of listed locations; {0} is the number of locations

data.name: View events at: {0}
data.comment: Link to view events at a location; {0} is the name of the location

data.name: {0} (opens in a new window)
data.comment: Description of a link with information added to indicate the link opens in a new window; {0} is the link description

data.name: {0} offers:
data.comment: Label indicating what type of materials a service offers; {0} is the name of the service (e.g. "ConsumerReports.org", "OverDrive")

data.name: Episode {0}, published {1}.
data.comment: Podcast details message; {0} is the episode number, {1} is the publication date

data.name: You can listen to our podcast on:
data.comment: Label prompting external services which carry a podcast

data.name: Podcasts
data.comment: Page header for podcasts

data.name: {0} Podcast
data.comment: Podcast title; {0} is the name of the podcast

data.name: Email
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to enter their email address

data.name: Language
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to select a language

data.name: Name
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to enter their name

data.name: Notes
data.comment: Label prompting a customer to enter notes regarding their service request

data.name: You must supply a value for: {0}
data.comment: Error message: required field; {0} is the required field

data.name: The {0} field is required.
data.comment: Label noting that a field is required; {0} is the required field

data.name: Here are the details of your appointment:
data.value: Aquí están los detalles de su cita:
data.comment: Label indicating the details for a customer's service appointment

data.name: Please check your email for important information about this appointment.
data.value: Consulte su correo electrónico para obtener información importante sobre esta cita.
data.comment: Label indicating the customer should check their email for details about the appointment

data.name: How can we help?
data.comment: Label asking what sort of assistance the customer needs

data.name: Scheduling is currently not available.
data.value: La programación no está disponible actualmente.
data.comment: Label asserting that scheduling appointments is currently not available

data.name: Request a different time
data.comment: Label encouraging selection of a different time if the selected time is not available

data.name: Please help us out by telling us a little about your request.
data.value: Ayúdenos contándonos un poco sobre su solicitud.
data.comment: Label encouraging customer to describe their help request

data.name: Schedule your time
data.comment: Header for customers to schedule a time for their help request

data.name: Your time is scheduled
data.comment: Header for success page once a customer's time is scheduled

data.name: Visit home page
data.comment: Label describing the home page link

data.name: Libraries closest to ZIP code: {0}
data.value: Bibliotecas más cercanas al código postal: {0}
data.comment: Label describing the search results for libraries close to a ZIP code; {0} is the ZIP code

data.name: Enter a 5 digit ZIP code
data.value: Ingrese un código postal de 5 dígitos
data.comment: Prompt to enter a five digit ZIP code to find the nearest locations

data.name: Use my location
data.comment: Button: engage a mobile device's GPS to look up the customer's location

data.name: (opens in a new window)
data.comment: Information added to buttons or links to indicate they open in a new window

data.name: Location
data.comment: Column header for a location

data.name: Hours
data.comment: Column header describing when the location is open

data.name: Status
data.comment: Column header with product inventory status

data.name: Last Update
data.comment: Column header describing when data was last updated

data.name: Has {0}
data.comment: Text indicating that a location has an item. {0} will be replaced with the name of the item

data.name: Does not have {0}
data.comment: Text indicating that a location does not have an item. {0} will be replaced with the name of the item

data.name: Show notes for: {0}
data.comment: Header for a podcast's show notes; {0} is the episode title

data.name: View show notes
data.comment: Label that links to a podcast's show notes

data.name: Special Hours
data.comment: Indicating that operating hours are atypical on this day

data.name: Today's Hours: {0}
data.comment: Text to indicate what the hours are for today

data.name: Availability & Experience
data.comment: The second part of the volunteer form has this as a header

data.name: Contact Information
data.comment: The first part of the volunteer from has this as a header

data.name: An error occurred and we could not find libraries near that location.
data.value: Hubo un error y no pudimos encontrar bibliotecas cerca de esa ubicación.
data.comment: Performing a zip code lookup failed due to a technical issue.

data.name: An error occurred and we could not save your submission, please try again.
data.value: Hubo un error y no pudimos guardar su aplicación, inténtelo de nuevo.
data.comment: Saving a volunteer submission failed due to a technical issue.

data.name: This location is not accepting volunteer applications at this time.
data.value: Esta localidad no está aceptando solicitudes de voluntarios en este momento.
data.comment: Customer tried to access the form for a location not taking applications.

data.name: This location is not accepting adult volunteer applications at this time.
data.value: Esta localidad no está aceptando solicitudes de adultos voluntarios en este momento.
data.comment: Customer tried to access the form for a location not taking adult applications.

data.name: This location is not accepting teen volunteer applications at this time.
data.value: Esta localidad no está aceptando solicitudes de voluntarios adolescentes en este momento.
data.comment: Customer tried to access the form for a location not taking teen applications.

data.name: Use our adult volunteer form.
data.value: Utilice nuestro formulario para adulto voluntario.
data.comment: If the customer is on the teen form, this is the text that links to the adult form.

data.name: Use our teen volunteer form.
data.value: Utilice nuestro formulario para adolescente voluntario.
data.comment: If the customer is on the adult form, this is the text that links to the teen form.

data.name: Are you an adult looking to volunteer?
data.comment: If the customer is on the teen form, this prompts them to use the adult form if needed.

data.name: Are you a teen looking to volunteer?
data.comment: If the customer is on the adult form, this prompts them to use the teen form if needed.

data.name: Why do you want to volunteer? Describe any previous volunteer experience.
data.value: ¿Por qué quiere ser voluntario? Describa cualquier experiencia previa de voluntario.
data.comment: Volunteer form prompt asking about interest.

data.name: Parent/Guardian Email
data.comment: If a teen is volunteering, this prompts for their parent or guardian email address.

data.name: Parent/Guardian Name
data.comment: If a teen is volunteering, this prompts for their parent or guardian name.

data.name: Parent/Guardian Phone
data.comment: If a teen is volunteering, this prompts for their parent or guardian phone.

data.name: Are you interested in regular volunteer work or certain number of hours?
data.value: ¿Está interesado en el trabajo voluntario regular o solo cierto número de horas?
data.comment: Volunteer form prompt asking a teen about their volunteer desires

data.name: Weekly Availability
data.comment: Volunteer form prompt asking about when a customer is available to work

data.name: Volunteer
data.comment: Text to show as the page title on the volunteer form page

data.name: Thank you for your interest! Someone will be in touch with you very soon.
data.value: ¡Gracias por su interés! Una persona de nuestro equipo se pondrá en contacto con usted muy pronto.
data.comment: Default follow-up shown to customer after submitting volunteer form.

data.name: At This Location
data.comment: Header for displaying services available at this particular location

data.name: Contact Us
data.comment: Link to instructions on how to contact the site owner

data.name: See services at all of our libraries
data.value: Ver los servicios de todas nuestras bibliotecas
data.comment: Textual link on the location page for showing services at all locations

data.name: Services Available
data.comment: Header for displaying services available for a location

data.name: Sign up for our email newsletter
data.comment: Button for call to action - subscribe to newsletter

data.name: Search the catalog
data.comment: Placeholder text for the search field

data.name: Search
data.comment: Hover text to display on the search button
